CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 21, 1957, pg. B4, reads: "Peoples Cab Company Stages Civil Defense Demonstration - Direct Civil Defense Plan - Civil Defense Director John B. Sullivan, left, took over the radio at Peoples Cab Company and directed the cabs to strategic focal points throughout the city to lead other vehicles in case of a bombing raid. Adolph Fram, Peoples president, looks on. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Civil Defense Director John B. Sullivan at microphone, and Adolph Fram, conducting drill in dispatch booth at Peoples Cab Company with sign in window reading "This Is A Unit of Your Civil Defense"
